title: NegativeInterestRateTreatmentEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify the method of calculating payment obligations when a floating rate is negative (either due to a quoted negative floating rate or by operation of a spread that is subtracted from the floating rate).

oneOf.title: NegativeInterestRateMethod
oneOf.description: Negative Interest Rate Method. Per 2000 ISDA Definitions, Section 6.4 Negative Interest Rates, paragraphs (b) and (c).

oneOf.title: ZeroInterestRateMethod
oneOf.description: Zero Interest Rate Method. Per 2000 ISDA Definitions, Section 6.4. Negative Interest Rates, paragraphs (d) and (e).
